app_detail:
Slidejoy - Video Maker with Song and Video Editor

SLIDEJOY Video Maker is the easiest video editing tool and slideshow maker to make stylish videos/photos/vlog. Create a video with Slideshow style with your Photos, music and Best Animation or stickers.You can create Video Stories from images and music with Photo Video Maker with song.

A spark video combined with popular themes, special subtitles and hot music will be shown.

#Slidejoy Key Features & Highlights

ğŸ“Œ Professional Video Editing Tool:
Slidejoy Video Maker offers the best tools for you to quick cut/merge/reverse/rotate/trim/split/ duplicate/compress your clips and cut movie. You can cut video in parts, merge images from your gallery or album, compress video without losing quality like a professional video producer, zoom in/speed up/speed down the video to make a super interesting piece of art.

ğŸ“Œ Musical Video Status Maker:
Slidejoy Status Video Maker is the ideal video maker tools to turn your photos into great looking video clips with only 3 steps! With its funny and easy video template, you can instantly record your life moment in a spark video with awesome effects, fantastic filters, and popular themes! Alsoï¼Œlyrics video editing is our another new highlight for all lyrics video status maker.

ğŸ“Œ Auspicious Themes:
Slidejoy have various free themes and unique transition. It only takes one tap to create an awesome music video or ideal slideshow instantly. Free VideoMaker & VideoEditor makes it easy for you to grab attention and gain more followers and likes on social media by editing your photos and clips into eye catching video.

ğŸ“Œ Various Music: 
Video Maker offers fully licensed music to make your video fun and popular. Pick all the trendy music you like and make impressive video. Edit the length of the music and apply to your movie/slideshow.

ğŸ“Œ Cute Stickers: 
Thereâ€™re various GIF, emoji, creative sticker. The FX options and animated stickers are also fun. Our facial recognition makes you look fantastic in any video/slideshow/vlog. Slidejoy video editor makes it very easy for users to edit video and slideshow.

ğŸ“Œ Edit subtitle:
As a video editor, you can add meaningful or heartwarming notes and texts, and edit the date of your slideshow.

ğŸ“Œ My drafts:
Save an unfinished project as a draft if you want to edit or finish it later. You can continue editing your projects via My drafts on the home screen.

ğŸ“Œ Share: 
Easily sharing your videos to Facebook, YouTube, Instagram, Flipagram, Slidejoy. Record your special moments like wedding, Valentine's Day, Birthday...
